proposal1.heroHeadline: Lesia is losing 200 hours a year on manual proposals. Here's how to stop the bleed.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Currently, crafting proposals for web and graphic design services is time-consuming. Generate them in 47 seconds with our system.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Each of these is a direct drain on resources and revenue.

problems.title: Time Drained Writing
problems.description: Every hour spent writing proposals is an hour not spent on designing or client meetings. For a team of three, this loss is significant.

problems.title: Missed Client Opportunities
problems.description: Delayed proposals mean potential clients move on. This results in losing projects that could bring in thousands in revenue.

problems.title: Inconsistent Branding
problems.description: Manually written proposals risk inconsistent branding. This can weaken Lesia's professional image and cost client trust.

problems.title: Overhead Costs Rise
problems.description: Manual proposal creation adds to overhead costs. These costs could be redirected to enhance design resources or marketing.

problems.title: Stress on Small Team
problems.description: A team of three feels the pressure of proposal deadlines. This stress can reduce creativity and output quality in design work.

problems.title: Errors and Revisions
problems.description: Manual efforts increase the chance of errors. These errors lead to costly revisions and client dissatisfaction.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system replaces all these losses with automated efficiency.

solutions.title: Instant Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Currently, proposals consume hours to draft. Our system creates them in under 60 seconds, freeing up your time.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Manual creation risks brand inconsistency. Our AI ensures every proposal is perfectly aligned with Lesia's brand.

solutions.title: Real-Time Tracking
solutions.description: Tracking proposal engagement manually is impossible. Our system provides real-time insights into client interactions.

solutions.title: AI Chatbot Assistance
solutions.description: Currently, client queries delay the process. Our AI chatbot answers them instantly, keeping the client engaged.

solutions.title: Error-Free Proposals
solutions.description: Manual writing is prone to errors. Our system guarantees error-free proposals, enhancing client satisfaction.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for Lesia's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for Lesia around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for Lesia.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Transform Acme Corp's Digital Experience with User-Centric Design.
proposal2.heroSubheadline: We will revamp your digital presence to enhance user engagement and boost conversions.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Every day Acme Corp loses potential revenue due to user experience issues.

problems.title: High Bounce Rates
problems.description: With a bounce rate of over 60%, potential customers are leaving your site before engaging. This translates to lost sales opportunities.

problems.title: Low Conversion Rates
problems.description: Current conversion rates are below industry standards at 1%. This is a significant gap compared to potential revenue streams.

problems.title: Inconsistent Brand Messaging
problems.description: Inconsistencies in your brand messaging confuse potential clients, leading to a loss of trust and decreased market share.

problems.title: Outdated User Interface
problems.description: An outdated UI results in a 30% lower engagement rate, pushing users towards competitors with more modern designs.

problems.title: Poor Mobile Experience
problems.description: With mobile traffic accounting for 50% of visits, a poor mobile experience means losing half of potential customer interactions.

problems.title: Slow Page Load Times
problems.description: Pages taking longer than 3 seconds to load lead to a 40% increase in site abandonment. This directly affects your bottom line.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Our solutions directly address these losses to create a seamless user experience.

solutions.title: Custom Web Design
solutions.description: We'll redesign your website for a modern look that keeps visitors engaged and reduces bounce rates.

solutions.title: UX Optimization
solutions.description: By enhancing the user journey, we increase conversions and drive revenue growth.

solutions.title: Mobile Optimization
solutions.description: Improving mobile usability ensures you don't miss out on half of your potential customers.

solutions.title: Performance Enhancement
solutions.description: We will optimize page load times to decrease abandonment rates and boost user satisfaction.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: Lesia is your partner in crafting beautiful, user-friendly digital experiences.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Expertise
whyUsCards.description: Our track record speaks for itself with numerous successful projects improving client metrics.

whyUsCards.title: Client-Centric Approach
whyUsCards.description: We work closely with you to understand your unique needs and tailor our solutions accordingly.

whyUsCards.title: Innovative Solutions
whyUsCards.description: We stay ahead of trends to provide the latest in design and technology.

whyUsCards.title: Attention to Detail
whyUsCards.description: Our meticulous approach ensures every aspect of your project is carefully crafted.

proposal2.teamIntro: Meet the team that will bring your project to life.

team.name: Lesia Payne
team.role: Company Owner And Lead Ux Designer
team.bio: Lesia leads the strategy and manages client relationships with a focus on delivering results. Her expertise in UX design ensures top-notch project outcomes.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery Phase
process.description: We dive deep into understanding your business and goals.

process.title: Design Phase
process.description: Crafting beautiful designs that speak to your audience.

process.title: Development Phase
process.description: Bringing designs to life with cutting-edge technology.

process.title: Launch & Support
process.description: Ensuring a smooth launch and ongoing support.

proposal2.pricingIntro: Choose the investment option that best fits your needs.

pricing.name: Starter Package
pricing.description: Perfect for small businesses looking to make an impact online.

pricing.name: Growth Package
pricing.description: Ideal for growing businesses aiming to enhance user experience.

pricing.name: Enterprise Package
pricing.description: Comprehensive solution for large businesses with complex needs.

proposal2.ctaHeadline: Ready to Transform Acme Corp's Digital Experience?
proposal2.ctaDescription: Let's chat about how we can elevate your online presence. No strings attached.

lead.company_description:
We partner for postive change. 

We work with partners whose mission we connect with‚Äîwho are working to make the world better. For the past decade, we have put our time and expertise as designers, developers and UX strategists towards improving our community and giving back wherever we can.

We don't just design websites. We create valuable tools and information that your customers, clients and staff can actually use.

Whether we are doing graphic design or web development, our focus is usability so anyone can find what they are looking for, fast. Putting users first helps them find your website and helps your business grow.

Services include:
Responsive website design
User Experience (UX) design
Wireframing
Art direction
Logo design
Print graphic design
Signage and display design
Business card design
Packaging design
Trade show booth and banner design
Custom web development 
Customized Squarespace Websites
Information Architecture
Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
User-testing
Tree testing
QA testing
Website & usability audits
Web applications
Mobile web applications
